name: S2019 - The Coliny Migration
description:
Direct the primitive species of the Colin along their historical migration routes. A reversed tower defense strategy game.

You control a species named the Colin, who periodically migrate from Coliny to Coliny. Spawn units strategically and get them through each level. You will encounter obstacles and enemies bent on ensuring that the Colin never reach their destination.

How to Play:

  • Spawn Colin units by clicking the mossy part of the path.
  • Unlock and select different Colin units in the top right corner of the screen.
  • Get the Colin past obstacles and enemies.
  • Get as many Colin to the end of the level as you can!

Programmed by:

  • Marcus Daly
  • Jacob Rich
  • Kai Wang
  • Mitran Kwatra

Music: A New Beginning from Bensound.com

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/a-new-beginning
